name: css-master-class
description: CSS Masterclass course (Flexbox, Grid, PostCSS, CSSNext) ### CSS Flex - [x] CSS Flex Basics - [x] Main Axis and Cross Axis - [x] Flex Direction - [x] Flex Wrap - [x] Align Self ### CSS Grid - [x] CSS Grid Basics ( Row, columns and gaps) - [x] Auto columns, auto rows - [x] Template Areas - [x] fr unit, repeat - [x] minmax, max-content, min-content - [x] auto-fill, auto-fit - [x] Justify Content, Align Content and Place Content - [x] Justify Items, Align Items and Place Items - [x] Grid Column, Column Start and End - [x] Line Naming - [x] Grid Row, Row Start and End - [x] Grid Area - [x] Justify, Align, Place Self
